original:
During a NATO meeting held in Brussels yesterday, Italy has expressed its support for the integration of Slovakia and Romania into the alliance as full members.
The Italian Defence Minister, Lorenzo Guerini, said that Italy had been advocating for the enlargement of NATO for a long time, and that Slovakia and Romania would make excellent allies. Guerini also emphasized the strategic importance of
